metadata.title: CVE-2022-1249 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in pesign's cms_set_pw_data()function of the cms_common.c file. The function fails to handle the NULLpwdata invocation from daemon.c, which leads to an explicit NULLdereference and crash on all attempts to daemonize pesign.

criterions.comment: pesign package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
